about_the_game:
For 20 years war has been waged across the land. For 20 years the soldiers of the Southern Empire and the Rasnayan Legion have clashed. In a bid to bring the war to a decisive close, the Emperor has sent his elite force of agents, known only as the Talons, on a covert operation with the hopes of turning the tides of war.

But all is not what it seems within the empire. Treason has led to the capture and near extinction of the Talons.

Marauding outlaws and pirates threaten the livelihood of villages on the fringes of the empire

Soldiers betray and exploit the very people they swore an oath to protect

Blood spawn of an ancient and vile demon have ascended from the depths of the earth, driven by the war and chaos that washes the lands above in blood.

The world, seeded with a plague of war and corruption, has begun to tear itself apart

Experience the journey of Marcus Veridius as he is set on a path of vengeance to find and kill the ones responsible for the death of his unit.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains graphic depictions of violence, killing, death, and gore

short_description: Talon's Blade is a third person adventure RPG with an advanced direction based melee combat system. Experience the journey of Marcus Veridius as he is set on the path of vengeance. Explore a world plagued with war and corruption as the very foundations of an empire crumble around you.
